name: Hoverboard Stairs Accident
description:
Your cruising along on your new hoverboard and suddenly Oh No! Stairs! SMASH!

Dismount your hoverboard at the perfect moment and see if you can somersault to the bottom of the stairs.
Self balancing scooter fun!

Hilarious real physics damaging fun.

See if you can get to the top of the leaderboard.

Watch and share Video Replays.
